alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 11:51AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Logan, east central Scott and west central Yell Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1151 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fourche Valley, or 15 miles southwest of Danville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danville... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Mount Magazine... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Belleville... Havana... Corinth... Wing... Macedonia in Yell County... Waveland... Waltreak... Bluffton... Briggsville... Blue Ball... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County
